description: This file sets up a knowledge base using semantic chunking and PDF URL data, then creates an agent to query this knowledge base about Thai recipes.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: SemanticChunking
classes.description: A strategy for chunking documents based on semantic similarity.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from PDF URLs.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally in markdown.
